page.title: 03SURVEY 1871/1985, BROMPTON
page.content: Using the database{QUEST}we had fed into our computer the census return for{BROMPTON 1871}and we spent al lot of time 'finding out' about our village in the 1870's. We thought it would be a good idea to conduct a survey in Brompton in{1985}and to compare it with 1871. We argued a lot over the sort of questions we would like to ask and the questions we ought not to ask people. In the end we decided we were especially interested in people's jobs, how far they travelled to work and where they were born. We could compare jobs and place of birth with 1871 and could guess at how far people went to work in 1871. In 1871{99.8%}of the people in Brompton were born in the village or within 3 miles of the village.In 1985 {30%}were born within 3 miles.
